summary: Project includes a dedicated Hazard tab UI showing comprehensive environmental hazard status indicators and live-updating simulated statistics.
architectural_notes: Hazard tab is a specialized, dedicated tab (not combined with other UI roles) and should include all hazard categories.
Environmental and hazard statistics should be simulated and live-updating (not static placeholders).

existing_features.title: Add a new dedicated "HAZARD" tab to the main tab navigation and render it in both STANDARD and TACTICAL display modes.

Implement a new Hazard tab UI (new component file under frontend/src/tabs) that presents (a) an "All Hazards" section containing all hazard categories and (b) an "Environmental Status" section with detailed status indicators.
Add live-updating simulated statistics on the Hazard tab, including continuously changing hazard levels and derived statistics (e.g., trends and aggregates) without requiring manual user input.
Expand hazard data plumbing so the Hazard tab can show detailed hazard statuses (text) and include electrical hazard level alongside the other existing hazard levels.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a dedicated Hazard tab with detailed UI showing all hazard categories, environmental status indicators, and live-updating simulated statistics

projectName: Add dedicated Hazard tab with comprehensive hazards, environmental status, and simulated statistics
